snippet.title: Top Gear: Drift Legends
snippet.description:
Time to rev up the engines, roast tires to gravel-bashing zones, and drift to the uncontrollable for the legends are back! Can you become a drift legend? Learn how to drift from The Stig through 5 locations around the world and get sideways in iconic Top Gear cars!

Download and play now:
Apple: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1054263493
Google: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rushdigital.topGearDriftLegends
Windows: https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/9nblggh6hl30

Subscribe for more awesome Top Gear videos: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=Topgear

Top Gear YouTube channel: http://www.youtube.com/topgear
TopGear.com website: http://www.topgear.com

Top Gear Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/topgear
Top Gear Twitter: http://twitter.com/BBC_topgear

This is a commercial channel from BBC Studios. Service & Feedback https://www.bbcstudios.com/contact/contact-us/
